name: genna logan
text: The beyond meat pan pizza was perfect and they respected my no cheese request. I cant believe I ate a pizza and didnt have to lay on my side for 3 hours while I wait for the pain to go away. Never got pizza here before, best pizza I've ever had, thanks so much!!

name: LaTosha Walker
text: Our pizzas were poorly made and tasted as worse as it looked. We were visiting from out of town and we most definitely will not return.

name: Jessica N
text: I wish I could show you pictures for extra proof! They literally stole money from me. I tried to order a pizza online that came to 22.78, it wouldn’t let me. So I called in the exact same order. My card history showed a charge of 30.99 when …More

name: Beltis1
text: This like the the 3rd or 4th time I've ordered from this particular location since I moved and delivery takes forever and the food is warm at best.

name: Kayleigh Griffith
text: 2 hours later and we are still waiting on our pizza. I question why I continue to order here when our pizza ALWAYS takes atleast an hour. When it does eventually get here it most times the pizza is strewn about the box like the driver let …More

text: I am personally upset emotional that pizza huts dont deliver in my disable moms area because of the apts behind her have done criminal activity...when 6th street was open they delivered here with no problem!For everyone that knows bradley …More

text: Ordered at 530 pm couldn't find our order it is now 739 and they told me that I would get a refund in 3 to 7 buisness days this place is a joke

text: First time was good.  Wanted a personal plan again and was told didn't have them nor the topping I wanted. So got a medium and it was terrible the cheese was burnt. Not impressed.

text: Horrible service.  Delivery more than 1 hour late then driver left pizzas on porch without ringing door bell.

text: WORST pizza experience so far. I ordered a pizza box and it didn’t come until 1 hour and 30 minutes later. And the pizza was COLD

name: Gina Guillotte
text: My kids and I came for dinner tonight, Christmas Eve, dine in. My oldest had a Book It she really wanted to use. Our server, who I also believe was a manager went so above and beyond! She brought the kids several coloring sheets to use and …More

name: Kaila Ann
text: Order from here regularly they always forget the sauces I pay for I ordered and 2 marinara and only got one that’s half empty just ganna do dominos from now on

name: Jay Bay Bates
text: How can they not deliver to my house when I’m literally 10 minutes away??? Bogus. Thumbs down. 10 MINUTES. That’s why domino’s is the best.

name: Sammi Rose007
text: Great service and pizza! Came here often when we lived in Springfield. There is not a dine in Pizza hut where I live currently. Anytime, I am in the area, we always come here.  Pizza is on point! Salad bar is great too! Friendly employees!

name: Nickie Madden
text: Pizza was fresh out of the oven. It had a nice amount of toppings. Very good.

name: Linda P
text: First time dining in here. Last time too. The salad bar was gross. It was warm and a lot of the lettuce was already wilting. Several things were empty. We got there after the pizza bar was shut down. We paid for the salad buffet but I only …More

name: Kristen Simon
text: It's a pizza hut ....

name: Niki
text: 90% of the time the staff reads special requests-would be a 5 star if they could improve on this simple task.

name: Jackie Alexander
text: Their online system and brick and mortar store doesn’t communicate well. I would’ve never ordered from them if I knew it was going to take 1 1/2 hours. Now I know and will order from Dominos and Marcos, their pizza’s better anyways.

name: Larry Bud Price
text: Love it! Good pizza, good service, good price!

name: James Dunlap
text: Its not good the pizza was not done and they did not even add meat.

text: Ordered a pizza online at this location during an ice storm. They called to inform me that there is a 3-4 hour wait but assured me the pizza would still be delivered. She also gave me the option to pick up my pizza with a discount. I chose …More

name: Brandon Geist
text: Hurts my tummy

name: Michael Thompson
text: What can I say you can’t beat there afternoon buffet price. Tables and seating are dated as well as the tv. Some new tables and seating would go a long way. Foods always good and staff are friendly and helpful.

name: Julie McKinzie
text: Food and service good.

name: Leland Ritz
text: You look them up online to find a store. They list a local tn to call and you get an answering service in a different state. The first thing they want to know is which store are you going to, seriously! Then when you get there they, the …More

name: Andrew Hegele
text: I visited this location a few weeks ago for their buffet. I requested a water, but was convinced to go for a fountain drink so that the buffet would be discounted. They didn't bother explaining that it would be more expensive to go with the …More

name: emmanuel apolonio
text: The wait was ridiculously long every table had been served and waited on before I was was even asked if I wanted a drink. The tables were dirty and my waitress was rude and unprofessional. She acted like she was doing me a favor by taking my order. So all in all the experience was a total let down. Probably won't be back anytime soon.

name: John Mckissen
text: One of the crew members was talking to me unnecessarily and seemed to be on some kinda uppers. His supervisor could tell he was bothering me.

name: Kiah
text: Received my order which was a medium Italian sausage pizza. It didn't not taste right and the pizz was flat. Basically just thrown away money . Will not go to this Pizza Hut again. Best thing is to go to the one off 6th street.
